this_title: Once Upon a Midnight Dreary II
introduction: Welcome back to the town of Dreary where the gates of hell are open and waiting for you. This time we get five spine chilling stories including a horrifying space Alien invasion of Little Green Men, a visit from a hellish demon that appears from inside a bedroom closet who knows all your dark secrets, a seemingly happy couple who becomes the target of an angry phantom, a husband and wife on a flight who wake up in a mysterious dome structure with no idea how they got there, and finally a young woman seeking answers for her sister's gruesome death in the woods that is a continuation from the first film. While she searches, she catches the eye of the very creature that killed her. Once Upon A Midnight Dreary II is a much darker film featuring space aliens, demons, ghosts, an pure evil.
chinese_title: Once Upon a Midnight Dreary II
